comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? Unfortunately I don't know what user was doing when error occurred. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Application should not crash. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Osmdroid: osmdroid-android-3.0.10.jar Android: 4.1.1 Please provide any additional information below. Device: HTC Desire X connected to wifi Stacktrace: http://pastebin.com/36LEmxph

You can see the source code here:
https://code.google.com/p/osmdroid/source/browse/tags/osmdroid-parent-3.0.10/osmdroid-android/src/main/java/org/osmdroid/views/overlay/OverlayManager.java
The NPE is at OverlayManager.java:131 which means there's a null entry in the list.
I guess this is a random synchronization error that we're not going to fix.
